updateGoalPositions

public void updateGoalPositions(comp102x.assignment.Goal[][] goals)
Move one goal that is movable to an adjacent position randomly. This method is called by the program periodically to update the positions of the goals. Procedure is as follows. 1) Count up pairs of the hitted (empty) goal and the adjacent goal that is movable. 2) Select a target pair by a random number. 3) Swap the hitted (empty) goal with the movable goal of the target pair.

Specified by:
updateGoalPositions in interface comp102x.assignment.GameLogic
Parameters:
goals - 2D array of Goal objects that represents the goals displayed on the main game screen. Can be rewritten this content (side effects)

updateHighScoreRecords

public comp102x.assignment.GameRecord[] updateHighScoreRecords(comp102x.assignment.GameRecord[] highScoreRecords,
                                                               java.lang.String name,
                                                               int level,
                                                               int score)
Compares the record of the current game play with those of previous game plays and update the highscore records. This method is called by the program when the game finishes.

Specified by:
updateHighScoreRecords in interface comp102x.assignment.GameLogic
Parameters:
highScoreRecords - the 1D array of the GameRecords of previous game plays.
name - name of the current game play.
level - level of the current game play.
score - score of the current game play.
Returns:
the 1D array of the GameRecords which is updated with current game play.
